resources.string: Touch Start to take Participants Background Info

The Bilingual Aphasia Test was Android-ified by iLanguage Lab LTD, an OpenSource Fieldlinguistics company in Montreal, Canada.
 Programming: Gina Cook & Kim Dan Ngyuen
 Logo: Émie Dessureault& Alexandra Marquis
User Guide: Catherine Gervais & Alexandra Marquis
Go to the McGill BAT website
On the McGill BAT site you can get instructions on how to administer the Bilingual Aphasia Test, or download the PDF assessors test book.
Report a bug or request a feature

Special thanks to the Bilingual Aphasia community, our Speech Language Pathology interns Émie, Kim and Catherine, and the Android OpenSource developers for their work which directly or indirectly contributed to this project.

The Experiments are copyright their original authors, see the Experiment Home screen for details for each Experiment. Portions of this app are modifications based on work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Apache 2.0 License.
